data.title: Cost of Living in Islamabad
data.meta_description: Average prices of more than 40 products and services in Islamabad, PakistanAug 2024. Prices of restaurants, food, transportation, utilities and housing are included.
data.text:
Restaurants

Edit Range Meal, Inexpensive Restaurant 500.00 Rs. 250.00-1,000.00 Meal for 2 People, Mid-range Restaurant, Three-course 5,000.00 Rs. 3,000.00-10,000.00 McMeal at McDonalds (or Equivalent Combo Meal) 1,280.00 Rs. 1,100.00-1,600.00 Domestic Non-Alcoholic Beer (0.5 liter draught) 500.00 Rs. 300.00-1,000.00 Imported Non-Alcoholic Beer (0.33 liter bottle) 1,000.00 Rs. 600.00-1,200.00 Cappuccino (regular) 582.00 Rs. 300.00-900.00 Coke/Pepsi (0.33 liter bottle) 101.50 Rs. 70.00-150.00 Water (0.33 liter bottle) 64.09 Rs. 50.00-100.00

Markets

Edit Milk (regular), (1 liter) 242.80 Rs. 200.00-300.00 Loaf of Fresh White Bread (500g) 179.97 Rs. 110.00-280.00 Rice (white), (1kg) 378.27 Rs. 290.00-550.00 Eggs (regular) (12) 350.46 Rs. 250.00-480.00 Local Cheese (1kg) 1,780.03 Rs. 520.00-4,000.00 Chicken Fillets (1kg) 1,010.14 Rs. 550.00-1,500.00 Beef Round (1kg) (or Equivalent Back Leg Red Meat) 1,232.00 Rs. 750.00-2,000.00 Apples (1kg) 297.00 Rs. 160.00-450.00 Banana (1kg) 228.57 Rs. 150.00-350.00 Oranges (1kg) 228.82 Rs. 100.00-500.00 Tomato (1kg) 151.14 Rs. 50.00-300.00 Potato (1kg) 105.41 Rs. 50.00-180.00 Onion (1kg) 151.36 Rs. 80.00-220.00 Lettuce (1 head) 103.69 Rs. 60.00-158.00 Water (1.5 liter bottle) 106.36 Rs. 75.00-150.00 Bottle of Non-Alcoholic Wine (Mid-Range) 461.00 Rs. 150.00-1,500.00 Domestic Non-Alcoholic Beer (0.5 liter bottle) 247.10 Rs. 143.94-600.00 Imported Non-Alcoholic Beer (0.33 liter bottle) 566.67 Rs. 238.00-600.00 Cigarettes 20 Pack (Marlboro) 560.00 Rs. 500.00-700.00

Transportation

Edit One-way Ticket (Local Transport) 55.00 Rs. 50.00-100.00 Monthly Pass (Regular Price) 1,800.00 Rs. 1,500.00-2,000.00 Taxi Start (Normal Tariff) 250.00 Rs. 200.00-400.00 Taxi 1km (Normal Tariff) 119.00 Rs. 100.00-230.00 Taxi 1hour Waiting (Normal Tariff) 1,000.00 Rs. 800.00-1,500.00 Gasoline (1 liter) 282.88 Rs. 262.00-331.00 Volkswagen Golf 1.4 90 KW Trendline (Or Equivalent New Car) 6,000,000.00 Rs. 5,000,000.00-8,000,000.00 Toyota Corolla Sedan 1.6l 97kW Comfort (Or Equivalent New Car) 7,886,836.36 Rs. 7,450,000.00-8,500,000.00

Utilities (Monthly)

Edit Basic (Electricity, Heating, Cooling, Water, Garbage) for 85m2 Apartment 32,720.95 Rs. 17,000.00-45,000.00 Mobile Phone Monthly Plan with Calls and 10GB+ Data 1,365.39 Rs. 868.00-2,200.00 Internet (60 Mbps or More, Unlimited Data, Cable/ADSL) 5,000.00 Rs. 3,500.00-9,000.00

Sports And Leisure

Edit Fitness Club, Monthly Fee for 1 Adult 6,923.08 Rs. 3,000.00-15,000.00 Tennis Court Rent (1 Hour on Weekend) 2,200.00 Rs. 1,000.00-3,500.00 Cinema, International Release, 1 Seat 1,200.00 Rs. 1,000.00-2,000.00

Childcare

Edit Preschool (or Kindergarten), Full Day, Private, Monthly for 1 Child 16,227.27 Rs. 12,000.00-30,000.00 International Primary School, Yearly for 1 Child 960,000.00 Rs. 300,000.00-2,400,000.00

Clothing And Shoes

Edit 1 Pair of Jeans (Levis 501 Or Similar) 5,812.50 Rs. 2,000.00-10,000.00 1 Summer Dress in a Chain Store (Zara, H&M, ...) 7,214.29 Rs. 3,500.00-11,500.00 1 Pair of Nike Running Shoes (Mid-Range) 23,153.85 Rs. 7,500.00-40,000.00 1 Pair of Men Leather Business Shoes 11,183.08 Rs. 4,000.00-25,000.00

Rent Per Month

Edit Apartment (1 bedroom) in City Centre 55,500.00 Rs. 30,000.00-120,000.00 Apartment (1 bedroom) Outside of Centre 28,458.33 Rs. 20,000.00-50,000.00 Apartment (3 bedrooms) in City Centre 149,446.15 Rs. 100,000.00-250,000.00 Apartment (3 bedrooms) Outside of Centre 83,115.38 Rs. 50,000.00-120,000.00

Buy Apartment Price

Edit Price per Square Meter to Buy Apartment in City Centre 380,324.83 Rs. 64,583.46-592,015.07 Price per Square Meter to Buy Apartment Outside of Centre 253,125.19 Rs. 125,000.00-500,000.00

Salaries And Financing

Edit Average Monthly Net Salary (After Tax) 73,538.46 Rs.
